name: VGA123AIDANSMITH
description:
Game controls: 

WASD for movement

 Space bar to jump

left ctrl for running

'e' to pick up items and interact

Goal: Find cranks to open up a path to the final door, a door to the sky. 

Note: Placement of cranks has changed since the original layout, however it should still be easy enough to find them as you go. Have fun!
